Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.name: Cho-Manno, Revolutionary
Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.
Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.flavor: "Mercadia's masks can no longer hide the truth. Our day has come at last."
Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.original_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.

Reya Dawnbringer.name: Reya Dawnbringer
Reya Dawnbringer.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Reya Dawnbringer.flavor: "You have not died until I consent."
Reya Dawnbringer.original_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to play.

Ambassador Laquatus.name: Ambassador Laquatus
Ambassador Laquatus.flavor: "Life is a game. The only thing that matters is whether you're a pawn or a player."
Ambassador Laquatus.original_text: {3}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

Ascendant Evincar.name: Ascendant Evincar
Ascendant Evincar.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Other black creatures get +1/+1.
Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.
Ascendant Evincar.flavor: His soul snared by an angel's curse, Crovax twisted heroism into its purest shadow.
Ascendant Evincar.original_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Other black creatures get +1/+1.
Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.

rulings.text: If Ascendant Evincar stops being black, it gives itself -1/-1.

Phage the Untouchable.name: Phage the Untouchable
Phage the Untouchable.text:
When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.
Phage the Untouchable.original_text:
When Phage the Untouchable comes into play, if you didn't play it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

rulings.text: It is only considered “cast from your hand” if you cast it as a spell from your hand. Putting it onto the battlefield from your hand using a spell or ability will cause you to lose the game.
In a Commander game where this card is your commander, casting it from the Command zone does not count as casting it from your hand.

Kamahl, Pit Fighter.name: Kamahl, Pit Fighter
Kamahl, Pit Fighter.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to any target.
Kamahl, Pit Fighter.flavor: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.
Kamahl, Pit Fighter.original_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: The Legend rule only applies to two legendary permanents with identical names. If the names are different, even if they depict the same character, the rule does not apply.

Arcanis the Omnipotent.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
Arcanis the Omnipotent.text:
{T}: Draw three cards.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.
Arcanis the Omnipotent.flavor: "Do not concern yourself with my origin, my race, or my ancestry. Seek my record in the pits, and then make your wager."
Arcanis the Omnipotent.original_text:
{T}: Draw three cards.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Arcanis’s last ability can only be activated while it’s on the battlefield.

Mirri, Cat Warrior.name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
Mirri, Cat Warrior.text: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Mirri, Cat Warrior.original_text: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it's unblockable as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
